text: Polokwane is a city in South Africa. It is the capital of Limpopo Province and has about 130,000 people.| Polokwane City v Baroka FC: Don't sit on the fence for the Limpopo Derby | IOL| South Africa listeria: Source of 'world's worst outbreak' found - BBC News == References == Category:Cities in South Africa Category:Limpopo
